ThingDef.label: eye
ThingDef.description: A biological human eye. Collects light and transmits it to the brain.

ThingDef.label: ear
ThingDef.description: A biological human ear. Catches soundwaves from the air and transforms them into electrical signals for the brain.

ThingDef.label: nose
ThingDef.description: A biological human nose. Looks pretty and allows you to smell and taste.

ThingDef.label: jaw
ThingDef.description: A biological human jaw. Complete with a tongue and teeth, it allows for adequate chewing and tasting.

ThingDef.label: stomach
ThingDef.description: A biological human stomach. Breaks down food into nutrients, with the help of acids and enzymes.

ThingDef.label: spine
ThingDef.description: A biological human spine. Supports the back and contains the muscle memory.

ThingDef.label: pelvis
ThingDef.description: A biological human pelvis. Legs and the spine are attached to this.

ThingDef.label: arm
ThingDef.description: A biological human arm. Attached to the shoulder, this let you carry and manipulate things.

ThingDef.label: hand
ThingDef.description: A biological human hand. Great for holding weapons and performing surgeries with.

ThingDef.label: leg
ThingDef.description: A biological human leg. Attached to the pelvis, it gives you locomotion.

ThingDef.label: foot
ThingDef.description: A biological human arm. Dampens downward going motions and are great for foot baths.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial eye. Is a bit better than a biological eye, but is uncomfortable. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial arm. Noisy but strong, this arm works better than a biological arm in every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic leg
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial leg. Noisy but strong, this leg works better than a biological leg in every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial spine. A bio-gel nerve bundle runs down an articulated steel core, surrounded by a lattice-dust healing system. It is better than a biological spine.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic bludgeon
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial arm turned into a potent bludgeon weapon. Works much like a normal crude bionic arm, but now it's a deadly weapon.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic spike
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial arm turned into a potent piercing weapon. Works much like a normal crude bionic arm, but now it's a deadly weapon.

ThingDef.label: crude bionic ranged weapon platform
ThingDef.description: An advanced but crude artificial arm turned into a platform for ranged weapons. Equipped items won't be dropped when downed. Works much like a normal crude bionic arm, but now it's a deadly weapon.
